column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba is always a great place to bring people who are visiting the city. Fantastic atmosphere
column3: but I am sure the fruity ones are equally delicious)
column4: and a smorgasbord of great tapas to please everyone's tastebuds. I went with a group of six people
column5: so we were able to try many different items. I loved the bacon-wrapped dates
column6: the goat cheese baked in tomato sauce
column7: and the spinach-manchego stuffed mushrooms. The endive salad and the brussel sprout salad were a nice
column8: light choice to balance the heavier dishes.
